channel.title: Bubble on Yiyuan Fang's Stuff
channel.description: Recent content in Bubble on Yiyuan Fang's Stuff

item.title: 2022 Reading Records
item.description: How delightful are those fresh, untouched pages with enticing stories hidden in them! The pleasure of reading is drastically elevated during exam periods (alas how I started this blog!). Every dreadful task seems to be more pleasant when compared to reviewing. So here I am, happy to be back with another year’s reading records and comments. I like both fiction and non-fiction. Non-fiction is not immediately “useful”, and thus it is looked-down by some of my more career-oriented acquitances.
